document.description: SONIC® Cruisers Club is the official SONIC® fan club. Sign up and get rewards including free food and coupons.
document.body:
HOME WHAT IS SONIC ® ? MENU&NUTRITION QUICK VIEW MENU NUTRITION GUIDE (PDF) SODIUM GUIDE (PDF) ALLERGEN INFO (PDF) SONIC CRUISERS ® CLUB MY SONIC ® CARD KIDS TRIVIA STRICTLY BUSINESS CORPORATE PROFILE COMMUNITY REAL ESTATE INVESTOR INFO FRANCHISE INFO NEWSROOM CAREERS CONTACT US MERCHANDISE
Earn Free Food Voice Your Opinions Enjoy Birthday Treats
Join today to start getting all sorts of benefits.
Register your My SONIC ® card to load and reload it with ease, or upload your own pictures to our website. Join the Cruisers Insight Council ℠ and have the opportunity to voice your opinions. And, manage your email subscriptions to get cool stuff like a monthly e-newsletter with the latest SONIC news and a surprise for your birthday .
